Alumni & Faculty Highlights

Following graduation from the UCLA Department of Art, many alumni are featured in solo exhibitions and group exhibitions in art galleries across the world, from Blum & Poe in Los Angeles to Tate Modern in London.

2019/2020 Highlights

Date Artist Highlight
November 3, 2019 Ry Rocklen, BA '02, performance, Ry Rocklen: Food Group: The Body Palms, Palms Park, Los Angeles, California
November 1, 2019 - January 11, 2020 Calivn Marcus, MFA '15, solo exhibition, Go Hang A Salami Im A Lasagna Hog, David Kordansky Gallery, Los Angeles, California
November 9, 2019 - January 11, 2020 Matt Johnson, MFA '03, solo exhibition, Matt Johnson, Blum & Poe, Los Angeles, California
November 8 - December 21, 2019 Nikita Gale, MFA '16, solo exhibition, Hot World, Reyes | Finn, Detroit, Michigan

If you are an alumnus, please keep in touch! Complete our Alumni Contact Form and/or connect with the community at the School of the Arts and Architecture.
